items.title: BlobService was renamed to BlockBlobService in azure.storage 0.33.0
items.body:
BlobService seems to have been rewritten.
What I've gathered so far:
- BlobService was renamed/split into BlockBlobService, AppendBlobService, PageBlobService
- `put_block_blob_from_path` does not exist anymore, there is however `put_block`

Could you investigate? Are you still maintaining this code?

I will see if I can come up with a (temporary) workaround.

items.title: Can't write to Blob
